aprefix1. prefix ā shortened before a double consonant. 2. a negative prefixed to nouns, adjectives; and participles. 3. the augment prefixed to some roots in the Past and Conditional Tenses; e.g. akāsi.
ariyasaccant.an established fact; noble truth.
aṃsam.; nt.1. a part; a side; 2. shoulder.
aṃsakūṭant.shoulder.

jhāpanant.setting fire to.
jhāpitapp. of jhāpetiwas burnt; set fire to.
jhāpiyaabs. of jhāpetihaving burnt; having set fire to.
jhāpīyatipass. of jhāpatiis burnt.

jhāpetvāabs. of jhāpetihaving burnt; having set fire to.

jhāyiaor. of jhāyatimeditated or contemplated.
